description:
Tenn and Tenn, P.A. Is a trusted NH Law firm dedicated to helping clients solve their legal troubles. When confronted with a life-altering event – such as a severe injury from a motorcycle or car accident, accident, a family law matter including divorce or child custody, , or when facing criminal charges including DUI and DWI, our lawyers work hard to obtain the best results for their clients and fight to protect their rights. In 1995, attorneys John J. Tenn and James J. Tenn Jr. established the Manchester law firm . Over the years, the firm has grown to include Attorneys Mary Tenn and Annmarie Tenn. Yet, Tenn And Tenn, PA continues to provide a high quality service and advocacy to our clients. Our primary practice areas include:

• Personal injury
• Criminal Defense, including DUI
• Family law

For the past 20 years, our law office has handled a variety of complex and challenging cases involving personal injury, criminal defense, marital disputes, and business and contract issues. Armed with extensive training and experience, our attorneys offer large firm experience, on a more personalized client-centered environment. This client-centric approach has enabled our lawyers to build a reputation for achieving results.

Compassionate, strong and professional, our attorneys work to protect our clients while helping them reach their legal goals. While our lawyers are experienced litigators, they are also experienced mediators. We proudly offer alternative dispute resolution to clients who wish to avoid expensive and stressful courtroom litigation.

Whether your legal need is in the area of personal injury law, criminal law, domestic relations, or civil and commercial litigation, the attorneys at Tenn And Tenn, PA have the experience and ability to help you through your time of need. We will work with you to ensure you understand your legal rights and options, and we will remain at your side throughout the legal process.
